trans-unit.source: Represents a parameter to an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> and optionally its mapping to a <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en parameter til en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> og eventuelt en overføring til en <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Parameter names are not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Parameternavn skilles.

trans-unit.source: When querying an Oracle database using the Microsoft OLE DB Provider for Oracle (MSDAORA) and the ODBC.NET Framework Data Provider, using the `LIKE` clause to query values in fixed-length fields may not return all expected matches.
trans-unit.target: Under spørring til en Oracle-database ved hjelp av Microsoft OLE DB-leverandøren for Oracle (MSDAORA) og ODBC.NET Framework Data Provider, ved hjelp av den `LIKE` setningsdelen for spørringsverdier i faste lengden kan ikke returnere alle forventet samsvar.

trans-unit.source: The reason is that when Oracle matches values for fixed-length fields in a `LIKE` clause, it matches the entire length of the string, including any padding trailing spaces.
trans-unit.target: Årsaken er at når Oracle samsvarer med verdier for fast lengde felt i en `LIKE` setningsdelen den samsvarer med hele lengden på strengen, inkludert eventuell utfylling etterfølgende mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a table in an Oracle database contains a field named "Field1" that is defined as `char(3)`, and you enter the value "a" into a row of that table, the following code will not return the row.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en tabell i en Oracle-database inneholder et felt med navnet "Felt1" som er definert som `char(3)`, og du kan angi verdien "a" til en rad i tabellen, følgende kode returnerer ikke raden.

trans-unit.source: ```vb# Dim queryString As String = "SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE Field1 LIKE ?" Dim command As OleDbCommand = New OleDbCommand(queryString, connection) command.Parameters.Add("@p1", OleDbType.Char, 3).Value = "a" Dim reader As OleDbDataReader = command.ExecuteReader() ``` ```c# string queryString = "SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE Field1 LIKE ?"; OleDbCommand command = new OleDbCommand(queryString, connection); command.Parameters.Add("@p1", OleDbType.Char, 3).Value = "a"; OleDbDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader(); ``` This is because Oracle stores the column value as "a " (padding "a", with trailing spaces, to the fixed field length of 3), which Oracle does not treat as a match for the parameter value of "a" in the case of a `LIKE` comparison of fixed-length fields.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# Dim queryString As String = "SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE Field1 LIKE ?" Dim command As OleDbCommand = New OleDbCommand(queryString, connection) command.Parameters.Add("@p1", OleDbType.Char, 3).Value = "a" Dim reader As OleDbDataReader = command.ExecuteReader() ``` ```c# string queryString = "SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE Field1 LIKE ?"; OleDbCommand command = new OleDbCommand(queryString, connection); command.Parameters.Add("@p1", OleDbType.Char, 3).Value = "a"; OleDbDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader(); ```Dette skyldes at Oracle lagrer verdien i kolonnen som "a" (fylle "a", med etterfølgende mellomrom, til den faste feltlengden 3), som Oracle behandler ikke som et samsvar for parameterverdi av "a" med en `LIKE` sammenligning av faste lengden.

trans-unit.source: To resolve this problem, append a percentage ("%") wildcard character to the parameter value (`"a%"`), or use an SQL `=` comparison instead.
trans-unit.target: Du kan løse dette problemet ved tilføye jokertegn ("%") i prosent parameterverdien (`"a%"`), eller bruk en SQL `=` sammenligning i stedet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> class that uses the parameter name and data type.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> klassen som bruker Parametertypen for navn og data.

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på parameteren.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The value supplied in the oracleType parameter is an invalid back-end data type.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt i den oracleType parameteren er ugyldig bakenforliggende datatype.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> class that uses the parameter name and an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> klassen som bruker parameternavnet og en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When you specify an <xref:System.Object> in the `value` parameter, the <xref:System.Data.DbType> is inferred from the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en <xref:System.Object>i den `value` parameter, <xref:System.Data.DbType>utledes fra Microsoft .NET Framework-type for <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Data.DbType> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Use caution when you are using this overload of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Vær forsiktig når du bruker denne overbelastning av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>konstruktør.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: Because this overload takes a `value` of type <xref:System.Object>, you must convert the integral value to an <xref:System.Object> type when the value is zero, as the following Microsoft Visual C# example demonstrates.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne overlasten tar en `value` av typen <xref:System.Object>, må du konvertere heltallig verdien til en <xref:System.Object>typen når verdien er null, som Microsoft Visual C# eksemplet nedenfor viser.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: ``` Parameter = new OracleParameter("pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume that you are trying to call the `OracleParameter`(`string`, `OracleType`) constructor overload.
trans-unit.target: ``` Parameter = new OracleParameter("pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ```Hvis du ikke utfører denne konverteringen, kompilatoren vil anta at du prøver å kalle den `OracleParameter`(`string`, `OracleType`) konstruktøren overbelastning.

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på parameteren.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> class that uses the parameter name, data type, and length.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> klassen som bruker parameternavn, datatype og lengde.

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på parameteren.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The length of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The value supplied in the oracleType parameter is an invalid back-end data type.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt i den oracleType parameteren er ugyldig bakenforliggende datatype.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> class that uses the parameter name, data type, length, and source column name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> klassen som bruker den parameternavnet datatype, lengde og navn på kildekolonne.

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på parameteren.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The length of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The name of the source column.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kildekolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The value supplied in the oracleType parameter is an invalid back-end data type.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt i den oracleType parameteren er ugyldig bakenforliggende datatype.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> class that uses the parameter name, data type, size, direction, source column, source version, and other properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> klassen som bruker parameternavnet datatype, størrelsen, retningen, kildekolonnen, Datakildeversjon og andre egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter to map.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på parameteren til å tilordne.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The length of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på parameteren.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The name of the source column.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kildekolonnen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the source column is nullable, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kildekolonnen kan nullstilles, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som verdien for den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value supplied in the oracleType parameter is an invalid back-end data type.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt i den oracleType parameteren er ugyldig bakenforliggende datatype.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> class that uses the parameter name, data type, length, source column name, parameter direction, numeric precision, and other properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref> klassen som bruker parameternavnet datatype, lengden, navn på kildekolonne, Parameterretningen, numerisk precision og andre egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på parameteren.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The length of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på parameteren.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the field can be null, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdien i feltet kan være null, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The total number of digits to the left and right of the decimal point to which <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: Det totale antallet sifre til venstre og høyre for desimaltegnet som <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>er løst.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The total number of decimal places to which <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: Det totale antallet desimaler som <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>er løst.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the source column.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kildekolonnen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som verdien for den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value supplied in the oracleType parameter is an invalid back-end data type.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt i den oracleType parameteren er ugyldig bakenforliggende datatype.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref> for parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A> and DbType are linked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>og DbType er koblet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the DbType changes the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A> to a supporting <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor endres angi DbType den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>til en støttet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DbType, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A> properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: DbType, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>, og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A>Egenskaper for en parameter kan utledes ved å angi <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to specify them.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor er ikke angi dem.

trans-unit.source: However, they are not exposed in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid de ikke vises i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>egenskapsinnstillingene.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A> does not contain inferred value after statement execution.
trans-unit.target: Hvis størrelsen på parameteren har blitt utledes, for eksempel <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A>inneholder ikke utledede verdi etter setningen utføring.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: For `String` data types the default is <xref:System.Data.DbType>.
trans-unit.target: For `String` datatypene standard er <xref:System.Data.DbType>.</xref:System.Data.DbType>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the supported data types, see the appropriate <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: En liste over datatyper som støttes, kan du se den aktuelle <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>medlem.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [DataAdapter parametere](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property was not set to a valid <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ble ikke satt til en gyldig <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter is input-only, output-only, bidirectional, or a stored procedure return value parameter.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om parameteren bare slike, er bare utdata toveis eller en lagret prosedyre returverdien-parameter.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> is output, and execution of the associated <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> does not return a value, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> contains a null value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>er utdata og utførelse av den tilknyttede <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>returnerer ikke en verdi av <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>inneholder en nullverdi.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>

trans-unit.source: `Output`, `InputOut`, and `ReturnValue` parameters returned by calling <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> cannot be accessed until you call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.Close%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: `Output`, `InputOut`, og `ReturnValue` parametere som ble returnert av kaller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>får ikke tilgang til før du kaller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.Close%2A> <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.Close%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Input" name="Input" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Input" name="Input" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property was not set to one of the valid <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ble ikke satt til en av gyldig <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter accepts null values.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om parameteren godtar nullverdier.

trans-unit.source: Null values are handled using the <xref:System.DBNull> class.
trans-unit.target: Null-verdier behandles ved hjelp av <xref:System.DBNull>klasse.</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if null values are accepted, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nullverdier godkjennes, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forskyvningen for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The `Offset` property is used for client-side chunking of binary and string data.
trans-unit.target: Den `Offset` egenskapen brukes til klientside-dele opp binær-og streng.

trans-unit.source: For example, in order to insert 10MB of text into a column on a server, a user might execute 10 parameterized inserts of 1MB chunks, shifting the value of `Offset` on each iteration by 1MB.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å sette inn 10 MB med tekst i en kolonne på en server, en bruker kan utføre 10 parametriserte innsettinger på 1 MB biter endre verdien for `Offset` i hver gjentakelse av 1 MB.

trans-unit.source: `Offset` specifies the number of bytes for binary types, and the number of characters for strings.
trans-unit.target: `Offset`Angir antall byte for binære typer og antall tegn for strenger.

trans-unit.source: The count for strings does not include the terminating character.
trans-unit.target: Antallet for strenger omfatter ikke avslutter tegn.

trans-unit.source: The offset to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"> </xref> for parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The OracleType and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A> are linked.
trans-unit.target: OracleType og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>er koblet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A> changes the OracleType to a supporting <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>.
trans-unit.target: Angi derfor <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>endringer OracleType til en støttet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>, OracleType, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A> properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>OracleType, og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A>Egenskaper for en parameter kan utledes ved å angi <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to specify them.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor er ikke angi dem.

trans-unit.source: However, they are not exposed in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid de ikke vises i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>egenskapsinnstillingene.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A> does not contain inferred value after statement execution.
trans-unit.target: Hvis størrelsen på parameteren har blitt utledes, for eksempel <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A>inneholder ikke utledede verdi etter setningen utføring.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: For `String` data types the default is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>.
trans-unit.target: For `String` datatypene standard er <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the supported data types, see the appropriate <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType> member.
trans-unit.target: En liste over datatyper som støttes, kan du se den aktuelle <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>medlem.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [DataAdapter parametere](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> value that is the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"> </xref> verdi som den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"> </xref> for parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support positional parameters that are marked with a question mark (?).
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle støtter ikke posisjonelt parametere som er merket spørsmål (?).

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of digits used to represent the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det maksimale antallet sifre som brukes til å vise den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Setting the Precision or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Scale%2A> properties has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Angi nøyaktigheten eller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Scale%2A>Egenskaper har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of digits used to represent the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> property. The default value is 0, which indicates that the data provider sets the precision for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Det maksimale antallet sifre som brukes til å vise den <> </> *> egenskapen. Standardverdien er 0, som indikerer at dataleverandøren angir nøyaktigheten for <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Resets the type associated with this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller type som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When executing a command that includes parameter values, code can either set the type of a parameter explicitly, or the parameter can infer its type from its value.
trans-unit.target: Når en kommando kjøres som inkluderer parameterverdier, kode kan enten angir du en parameter eksplisitt eller parameteren kan utlede typen fra verdien.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method resets the parameter so that it can again infer its type from the value passed in the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden tilbakestiller parameteren slik at den kan utlede typen fra verdien som er angitt i parameteren på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method affects both the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter.DbType%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden påvirker begge <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter.DbType%2A>og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>Egenskaper for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resets the type associated with this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller type som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When executing a command that includes parameter values, code can either set the type of a parameter explicitly, or the parameter can infer its type from its value.
trans-unit.target: Når en kommando kjøres som inkluderer parameterverdier, kode kan enten angir du en parameter eksplisitt eller parameteren kan utlede typen fra verdien.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method resets the parameter so that it can again infer its type from the value passed in the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden tilbakestiller parameteren slik at den kan utlede typen fra verdien som er angitt i parameteren på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method affects both the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter.DbType%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden påvirker begge <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter.DbType%2A>og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>Egenskaper for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to which <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall desimaler som <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>er løst.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Precision%2A> or Scale properties has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Precision%2A>eller Scale-egenskapene har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Precision%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of decimal places to which <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: Antall desimaler som <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>er løst.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den maksimale størrelsen på dataene i kolonnen i byte.

trans-unit.source: Setting Size affects only the input value of a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Angir størrelsen påvirker bare inndataverdien for en parameter.

trans-unit.source: Return values and output parameters are not affected by this property.
trans-unit.target: Returverdier og utdataparametere påvirkes ikke av denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The Size property is used for binary and string types.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen brukes til binary og streng.

trans-unit.source: For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the Size property refers to the number of bytes.
trans-unit.target: Nonstring-datatyper og ANSI-strengdata refererer egenskapen til antall byte.

trans-unit.source: For Unicode string data, Size refers to the number of characters.
trans-unit.target: Unicode-strengdata refererer størrelse til hvor mange tegn.

trans-unit.source: The count for strings does not include the terminating character.
trans-unit.target: Antallet for strenger omfatter ikke avslutter tegn.

trans-unit.source: For variable-length data types, Size describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server.
trans-unit.target: For variabel lengde datatyper beskriver størrelse maksimal mengde data å overføre til serveren.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a Unicode string value, Size could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters.
trans-unit.target: For en Unicode-strengverdi kan størrelsen for eksempel brukes til å begrense hvor mye data som er sendt til serveren først hundre-tegn.

trans-unit.source: For bidirectional and output parameters, and return values, you must set the value of Size.
trans-unit.target: For toveis og utdata og returverdier, må du angi verdien for størrelsen.

trans-unit.source: This is not required for input parameters, and if not explicitly set, the value of is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter when a parameterized statement is executed.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nødvendig for inndataparametere, og hvis ikke er eksplisitt satt, verdien for er utledes fra den faktiske størrelsen på den angitte parameteren når en parametriserte setningen er utført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>, and Size properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>, og størrelsen egenskaper for en parameter kan utledes ved å angi <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to specify them.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor er ikke angi dem.

trans-unit.source: However, they are not exposed in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid de ikke vises i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>egenskapsinnstillingene.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, Size does not contain inferred value after statement execution.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis størrelsen på parameteren har blitt utledes, inneholder størrelse ikke utledede verdi etter kjøring av setningen.

trans-unit.source: For fixed length data types, the value of Size is ignored.
trans-unit.target: For fast lengde datatyper ignoreres verdien for størrelsen.

trans-unit.source: It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server.
trans-unit.target: Det kan derfor hentes for informasjon, og returnerer høyeste antall byte leverandøren bruker under sending av verdien for parameteren til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: Den maksimale størrelsen, i byte for dataene i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0 (to be used when you do not want to specify the maximum size of the value).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0 (som skal brukes når du ikke vil angi den maksimale størrelsen på verdien).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the source column mapped to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and used for loading or returning the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på kildekolonnen som er tilordnet til den <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> og brukes til å laste inn eller returneres av<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The link between the value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> and the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> may be bidirectional depending on the value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Direction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Koblingen mellom verdien for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable>kan være toveis avhengig av verdien for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Direction%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: The name of the source column mapped to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kildekolonnen som er tilordnet til den <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.
trans-unit.target: Angir eller henter en verdi som angir om kildekolonnen kan nullstilles.

trans-unit.source: This allows <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref> to correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref> til å generere riktig Update-uttrykk for kolonner som kan nullstilles.

trans-unit.source: SourceColumnNullMapping is used by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns.
trans-unit.target: SourceColumnNullMapping brukes av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>til å generere riktig oppdateringskommandoer når håndtering av kolonner som kan nullstilles.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Generally, use of SourceColumnNullMapping is limited to developers inheriting from <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis er bruk av SourceColumnNullMapping begrenset til utviklere arving fra <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>bruker denne egenskapen til å bestemme om kildekolonnen kan nullstilles, settes egenskapen til `true` hvis den kan nullstilles, og `false` hvis den ikke.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> is generating its Update statement, it examines the SourceColumnNullMapping for each parameter.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>er genererer Update-setningen, undersøker SourceColumnNullMapping for hver parameter.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If the property is `true`, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> generates a WHERE clauses like the following (in this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field): ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` If SourceColumnNullMapping for the field is false, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen er `true`, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>genererer en WHERE-setningsdelene for følgende (i denne spørringsuttrykk "Feltnavn" representerer navnet på feltet): ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` Hvis SourceColumnNullMapping for feltet er USANN, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>genererer følgende WHERE-setningsdelen: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` i tillegg @IsNull_FieldName inneholder 1 Hvis Kilde-feltet inneholder null, og 0 Hvis det ikke.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in Oracle Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.
trans-unit.target: Denne mekanisme gjør det mulig for en optimalisere ytelsen i Oracle-Server, og gir for vanlige kode som går over flere leverandører.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the source column is nullable, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Hvis kildekolonnen kan nullstilles, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> to use when you load <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"> </xref> skal brukes når du laster inn <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine whether the original or current value is used for a parameter value.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>under den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A?displayProperty=fullName>å finne ut om den opprinnelige eller gjeldende verdien brukes for en parameterverdi.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: This lets primary keys be updated.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at primærnøkler oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to the version of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> used by the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property (<xref:System.Data.DataRow> indexer), or the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er satt til versjon av den <xref:System.Data.DataRow>brukes av den <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen (<xref:System.Data.DataRow> indeksering), eller <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-metoden for den <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objektet.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Current" name="Current" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Current" name="Current" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ICloneable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.ICloneable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.ICloneable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ICloneable> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Et nytt objekt som er en kopi av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.ParameterName*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som inneholder <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.ParameterName*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.ParameterName*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.ParameterName*>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.ParameterName*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.ParameterName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for parameteren.

trans-unit.source: For input parameters, the value is bound to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> that is sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: For inndataparametere, verdien som er bundet til den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>som er sendt til serveren.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: For output and return-value parameters, the value is set on completion of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> and after the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> is closed.
trans-unit.target: For utdata og returner verdiparametere verdien som er angitt for fullføring av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>og etter den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>er lukket.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: For an input parameter, Value can be set to an object of either a Microsoft .NET Framework data type or an Oracle data type (for example, an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString>).
trans-unit.target: Verdien kan angis for en inndataparameter, til et objekt av typen Microsoft .NET Framework data eller en Oracle-datatype (for eksempel en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>eller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString>).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>

trans-unit.source: When you send a null parameter value to the server, you must specify DBNull, not null.
trans-unit.target: Når du sender en null-parameter-verdi til serveren, må du angi DBNull ikke null.

trans-unit.source: A null value in the system is an empty object that has no value.
trans-unit.target: En null-verdi i systemet er en tom objektet som har ingen verdi.

trans-unit.source: DBNull is used to represent null values.
trans-unit.target: DBNull brukes til å representere nullverdier.

trans-unit.source: If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet angir databasetypen, konverteres den bundne verdien til denne typen når leverandøren sender dataene til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren prøver å konvertere alle typer verdi hvis den støtter det <xref:System.IConvertible>grensesnittet.</xref:System.IConvertible>

trans-unit.source: Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringsfeil kan skje hvis den angitte typen ikke er kompatibel med verdien.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A> properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting Value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A>, og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A>Egenskaper for en parameter kan utledes ved å angi verdi.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Size%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.OracleType%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to specify them.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor er ikke angi dem.

trans-unit.source: However, they are not exposed in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid de ikke vises i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>egenskapsinnstillingene.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, Size does not contain inferred value after statement execution.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis størrelsen på parameteren har blitt utledes, inneholder størrelse ikke utledede verdi etter kjøring av setningen.

trans-unit.source: The `InputOutput`, `Output`, and `ReturnValue`<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> values used by the Value property will be Microsoft .NET Framework data types, unless the input value was an Oracle data type (for example, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString>).
trans-unit.target: Den `InputOutput`, `Output`, og `ReturnValue` <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>verdier som brukes av egenskapen Value blir datatyper for Microsoft .NET Framework, med mindre inndataverdien er en Oracle-datatype (for eksempel <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>eller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString>).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>

trans-unit.source: This does not apply to REF CURSOR, BFILE, or LOB data types.
trans-unit.target: Dette ikke gjelder REF MARKØREN, BFILINFORMASJON, eller LOB-datatyper.

trans-unit.source: The Value property is overwritten by the **Update** method.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Value overskrives av den **oppdateringen** metoden.

trans-unit.source: An object that is the value of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som verdien for parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null.
